title: Cheese Dip with Beer
directions: Cut a large hole in the top of the loaf of bread to form a bowl; set onto a serving platter.

Melt the cream cheese in a large saucepan over medium heat; stir in the Cheddar cheese, mozzarella cheese, beer, and garlic salt; heat, stirring continually, until all the cheese is melted; pour the hot cheese mixture into the bread bowl.
ingredients: 1 (1 pound) loaf round pumpernikel rye bread
1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened Philadelphia Cream Cheese Original 2 For $4.00 - Expires in 12 hours
